医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
孤独与糖尿病患者患心脏病的风险增加有关根据欧洲心脏病学会期刊《欧洲心脏杂志》今天发表的研究，孤独是糖尿病患者患心脏病的一个更大的危险因素，而不是饮食、运动、吸烟和抑郁。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Loneiness-linked-to-increased-risk-of-heart-disease-in-diabetics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Loneiness-linked-to-increased-risk-of-heart-disease-in-diabetics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=58cfeafe-4251-44b9-9a1a-6d405e251fbf Thu, 29 Jun 2023 21:20:50 -0400 Loneliness linked to increased risk of heart disease in diabetics
研究称长期新冠病毒不能被视为单一病症根据传染病开放论坛 5 月 31 日发布的全国性研究收集的新数据，长效新冠肺炎不是单一病症，也不应单独对待。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Long-COVID-cannot-be-treatment-as-a-single-condition-study-says.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Long-COVID-cannot-be-treatment-as-a-single-condition-study-says.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=089d7cc5-20de-4c87-96df-ece4136e47bf Thu, 29 Jun 2023 21:19:31 -0400 Long COVID cannot be treated as a single condition, study says
世界卫生组织宣布人工甜味剂阿斯巴甜可能致癌世界卫生组织最近表示，阿斯巴甜可能被宣布为“可能对人类致癌的物质”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/WHO-to-declare-artificial-sweetener-aspartame-as-possible-carcinogen.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/WHO-to-declare-artificial-sweetener-aspartame-as-possible-carcinogen.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=361127e5-6e43-4fa3-8c39-a89222fbdacb Thu, 29 Jun 2023 21:15:00 -0400 WHO to declare artificial sweetener aspartame as possible carcinogen
TikTok 上缺乏对身体有益的视频该研究论文研究了 TikTok 上的身体积极视频，分析了它们的内容、主题和信息。调查结果揭示了不切实际的美容标准普遍存在，并且缺乏明确的积极身体形象信息，这凸显了需要进一步调查此类内容对社交媒体平台的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/A-lack-of-body-positive-videos-on-TikTok.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/A-lack-of-body-positive-videos-on-TikTok.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e8e2134b-daa9-4111-8812-4f6a39e05521 Thu, 29 Jun 2023 21:07:00 -0400 A lack of body-positive videos on TikTok
如果人们意识到相关的癌症风险，他们会减少饮酒吗？饮酒是多种癌症的已知危险因素，但普通人群对这种联系的认识仍然很低。这项研究调查了美国成年人对酒精作为癌症危险因素的认识与饮酒量之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Do-people-drink-less-alcohol-if-they-are-aware-of-the-linked-cancer-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Do-people-drink-less-alcohol-if-they-are-aware-of-the-linked-cancer-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5d2d3c35-d4f2-4728-b52c-411d98c8d92c Thu, 29 Jun 2023 20:56:00 -0400 Do people drink less alcohol if they are aware of the associated cancer risks?
研究表明，接触烟草烟雾会增加儿童唾液中重金属的含量根据美国疾病控制与预防中心的数据，二手烟草烟雾仍然是室内空气污染的主要来源，在美国每年导致超过 41,000 名不吸烟的成年人死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Exposure-to-tobacco-smoke-increases-the-presence-of-heavy-metals-in-childrens-saliva-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Exposure-to-tobacco-smoke-increases-the-presence-of-heavy-metals-in-childrens-saliva-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4700f6c8-8c03-486a-80ad-e9b7c13ba33a Thu, 29 Jun 2023 20:53:44 -0400 Exposure to tobacco smoke increases the presence of heavy metals in children's saliva, study shows
KFF 健康新闻“健康怎么样？”：没有鱼子的一年自从最高法院在多布斯诉杰克逊妇女健康组织案中推翻全国范围内的堕胎权以来，可以轻描淡写地说，今年发生了很多事情。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/KFF-Health-News-What-the-Health-A-year-without-Roe.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/KFF-Health-News-What-the-Health-A-year-without-Roe.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2da54a03-9ee0-4175-aba8-5b78fbb4c1fe Thu, 29 Jun 2023 20:49:37 -0400 KFF Health News' 'What the Health?': A year without Roe
研究表明氰基三唑化合物可以选择性、快速杀死锥虫寄生虫一项新的研究表明，氰基三唑化合物是速效拓扑异构酶 II 毒物，可以选择性、快速杀死引起恰加斯病和非洲昏睡病的锥虫寄生虫。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Cyanotrizo-compounds-can-selectively-and-rapidly-kill-trypanosome-parasites-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Cyanotrizo-compounds-can-selectively-and-rapidly-kill-trypanosome-parasites-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bcbe856d-34c0-4a91-b4af-9e2cd90fb32b Thu, 29 Jun 2023 14:44:59 -0400 Cyanotriazole compounds can selectively and rapidly kill trypanosome parasites, study shows
科学家使用设计微管蛋白破解微管蛋白密码微管蛋白是一种在细胞的结构和功能中起着至关重要作用的蛋白质。它是微管的主要成分，微管是长的中空纤维，提供结构支撑，帮助细胞分裂，赋予细胞形状，并充当细胞内分子货物移动的轨道。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Scientists-use-designer-tubulins-to-crack-the-tubulin-code.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Scientists-use-designer-tubulins-to-crack-the-tubulin-code.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5917fd58-c85f-4709-8f8a-1e4f18e9428e Thu, 29 Jun 2023 14:41:01 -0400 Scientists use designer tubulins to crack the tubulin code
能源不安全与健康状况不佳之间的联系鉴于气候变化和即将向清洁能源过渡，许多解决能源不安全问题的长期计划需要更新。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/The-connection- Between-energy-insecurity-and-poor-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/The-connection- Between-energy-insecurity-and-poor-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=84a9469f-665d-4585-b694-99a7c6bf5da1 Thu, 29 Jun 2023 14:28:36 -0400 The connection between energy insecurity and poor health
